t.t-if: mode == ('new', 'billing') or (mode == ('edit', 'billing') and (can_edit_vat or 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat']))

input.t-att-checked: ('company_type' in checkout and checkout['company_type']!='company') or 'company_type' not in checkout
input.name: company_type

div.t-att-style: ('company_type' not in checkout or checkout['company_type'] != 'company') and 'display: none'
div.label: Company Name
div.t: Changing company name is not allowed once document(s) have been issued for your account. Please contact us directly for this operation.

input.name: company_name
input.t-att-value: 'commercial_company_name' in checkout and checkout['commercial_company_name'] or 'company_name' in checkout and checkout['company_name']
input.t-att-readonly: '1' if 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat'] and not can_edit_vat else None
input.t-att-title: company_name_not_editable_message if 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat'] and not can_edit_vat else None

div.t-att-style: ('company_type' not in checkout or checkout['company_type'] != 'company') and 'display: none'
div.label: TIN / VAT
div.t: Changing VAT number is not allowed once document(s) have been issued for your account. Please contact us directly for this operation.

input.name: vat
input.t-att-readonly: '1' if 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat'] and not can_edit_vat else None
input.t-att-title: vat_not_editable_message if 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat'] and not can_edit_vat else None

xpath.expr: //t[@t-if="mode == ('new', 'billing') or (mode == ('edit', 'billing') and (can_edit_vat or 'vat' in checkout and checkout['vat']))"]
